18#include "GenericLuminanceSource.h"
19#include "ByteArray.h"
20
21#include <algorithm>
22#include <cstdint>
23#include <memory>
24#include <stdexcept>
25#include <utility>
26
27namespace ZXing {
28
29inline static uint8_t RGBToGray(unsigned r, unsigned g, unsigned b)
30{
31 // This optimization is not necessary as the computation below is cheap enough.
32 //if (r == g && g == b) {
33 // // Image is already greyscale, so pick any channel.
34 // return static_cast<uint8_t>(r);
35 //}
36
37 // .299R + 0.587G + 0.114B (YUV/YIQ for PAL and NTSC),
38 // (306*R) >> 10 is approximately equal to R*0.299, and so on.
39 // 0x200 >> 10 is 0.5, it implements rounding.
40 return static_cast<uint8_t>((306 * r + 601 * g + 117 * b + 0x200) >> 10);
41}
42
43static std::shared_ptr<ByteArray> MakeCopy(const void* src, int rowBytes, int left, int top, int width, int height)
44{
45 auto result = std::make_shared<ByteArray>();
46 result->resize(width * height);
47 const uint8_t* srcRow = static_cast<const uint8_t*>(src) + top * rowBytes + left;
48 uint8_t* destRow = result->data();
49 for (int y = 0; y < height; ++y, srcRow += rowBytes, destRow += width) {
50 std::copy_n(srcRow, width, destRow);
51 }
52 return result;
53}
54
55static std::shared_ptr<ByteArray> MakeCopy(const ByteArray& pixels, int rowBytes, int left, int top, int width, int height)
56{
57 if (top == 0 && left == 0 && width * height == (int)pixels.size()) {
58 return std::make_shared<ByteArray>(pixels);
59 }
60 return MakeCopy(pixels.data(), rowBytes, left, top, width, height);
61}
62
63GenericLuminanceSource::GenericLuminanceSource(int left, int top, int width, int height, const void* bytes, int rowBytes, int pixelBytes, int redIndex, int greenIndex, int blueIndex) :
64 _left(0), // since we copy the pixels
65 _top(0),
66 _width(width),
67 _height(height),
68 _rowBytes(width)
69{
70 if (left < 0 || top < 0 || width < 0 || height < 0) {
71 throw std::out_of_range("Requested offset is outside the image");
72 }
73
74 if (pixelBytes == 1)
75 _pixels = MakeCopy(bytes, rowBytes, left, top, width, height);
76 else {
77 auto pixels = std::make_shared<ByteArray>(width * height);
78 const uint8_t *rgbSource = static_cast<const uint8_t*>(bytes) + top * rowBytes;
79 uint8_t *destRow = pixels->data();
80 for (int y = 0; y < height; ++y, rgbSource += rowBytes, destRow += width) {
81 const uint8_t *src = rgbSource + left * pixelBytes;
82 for (int x = 0; x < width; ++x, src += pixelBytes) {
83 destRow[x] = RGBToGray(src[redIndex], src[greenIndex], src[blueIndex]);
84 }
85 }
86 _pixels = std::move(pixels);
87 }
88}
89
90GenericLuminanceSource::GenericLuminanceSource(int left, int top, int width, int height, std::shared_ptr<const ByteArray> pixels, int rowBytes) :
91 _pixels(std::move(pixels)),
92 _left(left),
93 _top(top),
94 _width(width),
95 _height(height),
96 _rowBytes(rowBytes)
97{
98 if (left < 0 || top < 0 || width < 0 || height < 0) {
99 throw std::out_of_range("Requested offset is outside the image");
100 }
101}
102
103
104int
105GenericLuminanceSource::width() const
106{
107 return _width;
108}
109
110int
111GenericLuminanceSource::height() const
112{
113 return _height;
114}
115
116
117
118const uint8_t *
119GenericLuminanceSource::getRow(int y, ByteArray& buffer, bool forceCopy) const
120{
121 if (y < 0 || y >= _height) {
122 throw std::out_of_range("Requested row is outside the image");
123 }
124
125 const uint8_t* row = _pixels->data() + (y + _top)*_rowBytes + _left;
126 if (!forceCopy) {
127 return row;
128 }
129
130 buffer.resize(_width);
131 std::copy_n(row, _width, buffer.begin());
132 return buffer.data();
133}
134
135const uint8_t *
136GenericLuminanceSource::getMatrix(ByteArray& buffer, int& outRowBytes, bool forceCopy) const
137{
138 const uint8_t* row = _pixels->data() + _top*_rowBytes + _left;
139 if (!forceCopy) {
140 outRowBytes = _rowBytes;
141 return row;
142 }
143
144 outRowBytes = _width;
145 buffer.resize(_width * _height);
146 uint8_t* dest = buffer.data();
147 for (int y = 0; y < _height; ++y, row += _rowBytes, dest += _width) {
148 std::copy_n(row, _width, dest);
149 }
150 return buffer.data();
151}
152
153bool
154GenericLuminanceSource::canCrop() const
155{
156 return true;
157}
158
159std::shared_ptr<LuminanceSource>
160GenericLuminanceSource::cropped(int left, int top, int width, int height) const
161{
162 if (left < 0 || top < 0 || width < 0 || height < 0 || left + width > _width || top + height > _height) {
163 throw std::out_of_range("Crop rectangle does not fit within image data.");
164 }
165 return std::make_shared<GenericLuminanceSource>(_left + left, _top + top, width, height, _pixels, _rowBytes);
166}
167
168bool
169GenericLuminanceSource::canRotate() const
170{
171 return true;
172}
173
174std::shared_ptr<LuminanceSource>
175GenericLuminanceSource::rotated(int degreeCW) const
176{
177 degreeCW = (degreeCW + 360) % 360;
178 if (degreeCW == 90)
179 {
180 auto pixels = std::make_shared<ByteArray>(_width * _height);
181 const uint8_t* srcRow = _pixels->data() + _top * _rowBytes + _left;
182 uint8_t* dest = pixels->data();
183 for (int y = 0; y < _height; ++y, srcRow += _rowBytes) {
184 for (int x = 0; x < _width; ++x) {
185 dest[x * _height + (_height - y - 1)] = srcRow[x];
186 }
187 }
188 return std::make_shared<GenericLuminanceSource>(0, 0, _height, _width, pixels, _height);
189 }
190 else if (degreeCW == 180) {
191 // same as a vertical flip followed a horizonal flip
192 auto pixels = MakeCopy(*_pixels, _rowBytes, _left, _top, _width, _height);
193 std::reverse(pixels->begin(), pixels->end());
194 return std::make_shared<GenericLuminanceSource>(0, 0, _width, _height, pixels, _width);
195 }
196 else if (degreeCW == 270) {
197 auto pixels = std::make_shared<ByteArray>(_width * _height);
198 const uint8_t* srcRow = _pixels->data() + _top * _rowBytes + _left;
199 uint8_t* dest = pixels->data();
200 for (int y = 0; y < _height; ++y, srcRow += _rowBytes) {
201 for (int x = 0; x < _width; ++x) {
202 dest[(_width - x - 1) * _height + y] = srcRow[x];
203 }
204 }
205 return std::make_shared<GenericLuminanceSource>(0, 0, _height, _width, pixels, _height);
206 }
207 else if (degreeCW == 0) {
208 return std::make_shared<GenericLuminanceSource>(0, 0, _width, _height, _pixels, _width);
209 }
210 throw std::invalid_argument("Unsupported rotation");
211}
212
